welcome: To know about a vitamin, simply say its name. Try saying, Vitamin A, or say, help, to know more.
help: You can ask me about Vitamins. Namely, Vitamin A, B, C, D, E, and K . Try saying, Vitamin A , to know more about it.
didNotUnderstand: Sorry, I could not understand you, Try again, or say, help, to know more .
reprompt: Try saying, tell me about Vitamin A
vitaminBInfo: Vitamin B has eight subtypes. Namely, Vitamin B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B7, B9, and B12 .
continueSession: Do you want to know about another vitamin ?
continueSessionReprompt: If you want to know about other vitamins, say Yes, or Say, No, to exit .
askMore: Which vitamin do you want to know about ?
continueSessionForVitaminB: Try Saying , Vitamin B1 , to know more about it, or say, bye, to exit .
